mapper.select: SELECT USER.USER_NAME, ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_CONTENT, ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_DATE, ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_SCORE, ROOMS_REVIEW.USER_ID FROM ROOMS_REVIEW LEFT JOIN USER ON ROOMS_REVIEW.USER_ID = USER.USER_ID WHERE ROOMS_REVIEW.R_ID=#{r_id}
SELECT *, AVG(ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_SCORE) AS AAVG FROM ROOMS_REVIEW JOIN ROOMS ON ROOMS.R_ID=ROOMS_REVIEW.R_ID WHERE ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_SCORE GROUP BY ROOMS_REVIEW.R_ID LIMIT 5
SELECT ROUND(AVG(ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_SCORE),2) AS avg ,COUNT(ROOMS_REVIEW.REVIEW_CONTENT) AS review_count FROM ROOMS_REVIEW WHERE R_ID=#{r_id}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ROOMS_REVIEW WHERE 1=1
AND ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
